TopicTitle: The Future of Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content:
As squad continues to develop ksp further and further, we must ask ourselfs... What is the future of KSP? What might new updates hold? When will the next update come out? Will another company create a better game? This thread is for discussing and debating these things, and feel free to veer off topic. Here are some good topics to discuss.

Gas Planet 2 - A planet currently being worked on and will have <20 moons

Future Updates - What will the future hold?

Other Games Compaired to KSP - Orbiter... What else simulates space flight so well?

Future and Current Mods - Cmon, it's a necessity to the game!

Well, that's it! I look forward to seeing all of your debates and discussions!

Also, please vote in the pole. I want to see what you all think

Edited January 2, 2015 by CalMacDa
New planets would be ideal. Interstellar travel would maybe force them to add unrealistic features, and that could cause an outrage.
Scan-Sat integrated so I can find all of the new biomes.
Yeah... The Mun alone has I think nineteen biomes.. So much science, but finding each individual biome is tough...
This poll would probably work better if >1 option could be selected. I think most people would like more than one of the things listed.
Cool. I considered that, but then people might spams it.

I voted Interstellar Travel. If they do nothing else between now and 1.0, I would want them to just add interstellar travel, with some sort of procedural generation of exoplanets.

...well okay, integrating Kerbal Alarm Clock would be nice too xP
Yeah. Things like alarm clock, mech Jen, and flight engineer are very very helpful and improve everything you do in so many ways.
Less polls asking us what we want in the game. One per version is fine, more than that is excessive. What we have now is just crazy.
Okay Horseman... Does that mean that my thread has been... *GASP* ...Somewhat deleted?!
i hope they will finish it and fix the bugs

i hope they will finish it and fix the bugs

This, pretty much. Perfectly happy with creating the KSP I want with mods, all Squad needs to do is change the asset loader so it's not as asinine as it is now, finish what they're planning for KSP, document everything so it's easily available for modders, update to Unity 5/ensure Winx64 is stable and fix bugs. In that order.
